# zitadel_action_execution_response (Data Source)

Datasource representing an action execution triggered by a response.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource. Must be set to the condition, e.g. `method:/zitadel.session.v2.SessionService/ListSessions`, `service:zitadel.session.v2.SessionService`, or `all`/`all:`

### Read-Only

- `all` (Boolean) Trigger on all responses.
- `method` (String) The gRPC method to trigger on.
- `service` (String) The gRPC service to trigger on.
- `target_ids` (List of String) The list of target IDs to call.
